title: Book Cover, "Poetry Series: The Son of the Duke of"
description: Front cover, inside of large vertical rectangle, blue and white ssketch of bust of nobleman with sash, metals and high brocade collar. Instead of nobleman's face, miniature sketch of lihthouse landscape. Above sketch inside rectangle, author's name on two lines and italicized title on next two lines, all in black text on cream ground. Rectangle superimposed on repetitive Faber and Faber logo pattern in blue and white. Back cover inside of large rectangle, Faber and Faber logo above author's name and italicized title. Below title, paragraph of book description above two lines of book review. Rectangle superimposed on top of repetitive Faber and Faber logo pattern in blue and white. Spine, thin cream-colored rectangle with author's name next to title and at lower edge of rectangle Faber and Faber logoin black text superimposed on repetitive Faber and Faber logo pattern.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "Poetry Series: The Son of the Duke of". offset lithography. Gift of Steven Heller. 1996-74-167.
